steps.title: Hand Rankings Overview
steps.message: Poker hands are ranked from strongest to weakest. Let’s go through them.

steps.title: Top Hands
steps.message: Royal Flush > Straight Flush > Four of a Kind > Full House > Flush > Straight

steps.title: Lower Hands
steps.message: Three of a Kind > Two Pair > One Pair > High Card

steps.title: Remember
steps.message: The stronger your hand, the better your chances of winning — but don't forget strategy matters too!
